thread.title: Mold's Daniel Owen Square officially reopens

author: wn.com
title: Mold's Daniel Owen Square officially reopens
text: A revamped Flintshire town square has reopened as part of a festival to celebrate its literary namesake. A festival is being held on Mold's Daniel Owen Square to mark its Â£100,000 upgrade as part of the town's annual celebration of the novelist, described as the Welsh Dickens. A statue of Owen, who died more than 100 years ago, overlooks the square, which now includes a performance area. A time capsule is being buried next to the statue on Thursday.
